notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msItem.title: Maḥzor minhag Teman מחזור מנהג תימן

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite square script of the 19th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Services For The New Year, Etc. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 5469.'

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
S. Raffalovich: purchased by the British Museum from him on 13 December 1898: inscribed, folio [140v] (fse001v).
